altername_name: Ultraman Tiga & Ultraman Dyna: Aratanaru Futatsu no Hikari
Ultraman Tiga & Ultraman Dyna - Arata naru Futatsu no Hikari
name: Ultraman Tiga & Dyna Fighting Evolution: New Generations
overview: Ultraman Tiga & Ultraman Dyna Fighting Evolution - New Generations is a 3d fighting game with 14 different stages in the story mode where Tiga & Dyna have to protect Earth against evil enemies and an unlockable monster guide with character profiles that will be unlocked playing the main game.
